main event: An unidentified object sighting was reported in Albuquerque, New Mexico on August 10, 1955.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 15 minutes,The object was described as a round-disc-shaped silver object trailing smoke,It was determined that the object was likely a weather balloon, but other possibilities could not be ruled out,Three aircraft were scrambled but could not find the object in the area,The object initially appeared stationary before it began to rise slowly.
witness description: housewife from 1413 La Vega Dr SW, Albuquerque
